function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in shared office spaces and co-working environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, potential outbreaks, and employee absenteeism.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improved ventilation systems, and regular disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-light disinfection, touchless technology for doors and elevators.","People":"Office workers, co-working space users, building occupants.","Owner":"Employers, building owners, facility management."},{"Description":"High density in offices and shared facilities leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread and potential for widespread outbreaks within office settings.","Mitigation":"Reducing office density, providing alternative work arrangements, staggered shifts, and remote work options.","Technologies":"Remote work technology, video conferencing tools, occupancy sensors for space management.","People":"Office workers, building occupants, visitors.","Owner":"Employers, building owners, facility management."},{"Description":"Reluctance to use elevators in high-rise buildings due to disease transmission concerns.","Impact":"Reduced accessibility to upper floors, decreased building occupancy, and increased congestion in stairwells.","Mitigation":"Enhancing elevator ventilation, implementing touchless elevator controls, promoting stair use for lower floors, and implementing physical distancing measures in elevators.","Technologies":"Elevator occupancy sensors, touchless elevator controls, UV-light disinfection for elevator surfaces.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, property management, elevator maintenance companies."}]}
